text:
FundApps was recently recognised as one of the top 50 fintech startups in Europe. We sell a web service that automates financial regulatory compliance. We're a company of 16 right now, and somewhat unusually are a bootstrapped startup are growing rapidly through acquisition of customers rather than funding. Current openings we have in London.

-Full Stack UI Engineer -Infrastructure / Ops Engineer -.NET / Backend Engineer

More here: http://fundapps.workable.com/ or email me direct - james.peters@fundapps.co if you have questions. Thanks!
